name: asset-tool
description: Tool to help calculate and view a breakdown of daily, monthly, and annual finances.

scripts.patch-release: npm run update-changelog && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm run update-changelog && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm run update-changelog && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Evan Bonsignori
